name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Magento 2 - Admin Associated Grouped Products URL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a chrome based extension, that allow the Magento 2 Merchant to add an "url" link to all associated products of Grouped Product Type. Having the same behaviour as the Configurable Product Type.
